author: jstrachan
msg: Minor patch so that the <soap:invoke> tag can take the parameters as an attribute...
Also added another example that converts MM to inches using a web service; using Floats.

author: jstrachan
msg: Added SOAP support via Apache Axis.
This is based on a patch submitted by Jim Birchfield which allows SOAP services to be invoked using Apache Axis and the results output.
Its early days and we'll improve this support considerably over time but at least the basics are working for now.
which invokes a sample Axis echo service and an xmethods.net service.

author: jstrachan
msg: Patched to work against the latest snapshot of commons-discovery

author: jstrachan
msg: avoided null pointer exception if inherit is true and there is no parent
